title: Tweaked trait example from tutorial fails in rustc/back/rpath.rs
body:
Code taken nearly as-is from tutorial, commit [`39acb06`](https://github.com/mozilla/rust/commit/39acb06503bc387709b22c17c32cd58cd16b617a).

``` rust
trait Printable {
    fn print();
}

impl int: Printable {
    fn print() { io::println(fmt!("%d", self)); }
}

fn main() {
    10.print();
}
```
